name: Rebirth-I am Yuan Shang
description:
A small game adapted from the Romance of The Three Kingdoms, one of the four great classics of China.

Not Liu Bei, not Sun Quan, nor Cao Cao, but played Yuan Shao's son Yuan Shang.(Yuan Shao, who was defeated by Cao Cao in the Battle of Guandu In 202 AD).Although later after Yuan Shao died, Yuan Shang also lost to Cao Cao in the original work,he is now reborn in the game.

Rebirth-I am Yuan Shang, defeat Cao Cao to win the game!
